feature.summary: The Advanced SR Allocation for Privileged Access Users feature ensures the acceptance of

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.nrOfPreallocatedSrRes  EUtranCellTDD.nrOfPreallocatedSrRes
parameters.description: For more information, see the MOM description.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.allocThrPucchFormat1  EUtranCellTDD.allocThrPucchFormat1
parameters.description: A verification was made to ensure that the                                     EUtranCellFDD.allocThrPucchFormat1 or                                     EUtranCellTDD.allocThrPucchFormat1 attributes                                 in the Dynamic PUCCH feature are always set to a value which is                                 higher than the AdmissionControl.limitSrNonPa                                 attribute, so the expansion of SR resources by the Dynamic PUCCH                                 feature occurs before the limit of SR resources is reached.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012281 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012281 MO instance.
